DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Infants Young Children : Children 618 month age . Consuming solid food least past 30 day . Apparently healthy presently suffer acute illness ( e.g. , fever , diarrhea , acute respiratory tract infection ) . No known allergy peanut food product ( report screen questionnaire mother/primary caregiver ) . Not severely malnourish [ midupper arm circumference ( MUAC ) > 115 mm ] . Maternal/caregiver willingness feed infant LNS maximum 3 test day , 2 week homeuse period , report his/her consumption reaction practice daily use . Willingness participate discussion group . Planning remain study area least following three week . Exclusion Criteria Infants Young Children : Children 6 month age . All subject know peanut , soy milk allergy . In poor health ill time recruitment . Severely malnourished child [ midupper arm circumference ( MUAC ) < 115 mm ] . Not willing participate study procedure . Leaving study area follow three week .
